name: ...For More Time On The Clock
description:
It's an arcade FPS!

Kill opponents, and aim for the highest score possible before the time runs out!

* Kill enemies to score points, and pick up the items they drop to increase your multiplier!
* Return to one of the green pads with a multiplier greater than 1.0x to restore your health and extend your time, but be warned! Doing so reduces your multiplier back to 1.0x!

Controls:

* WASD - Move
* Left Mouse - Long Range Attack
* Right Mouse - Short Range Attack
* Space - Jump (and space again in the air to double-jump)
* Left Shift + Movement Keys - Teleport
* ESC - Quit Game
